verses.roman:
puruṣottama-jānāre teṅha kaila parihāsa
sei 'jānā' tāre dekhāila mithyā trāsa

synonyms: puruṣottama-jānāre—at Puruṣottama Jānā, the prince; teṅha—he; kaila parihāsa—made a joke; sei jānā—that prince; tāre—unto him; dekhāila—showed; mithyā—false; trāsa—scare.
translation: "He sneered at Puruṣottama Jānā. Therefore the prince tried to scare him as a punishment.
